document_data.caption: Mickey (left), alongside [[Mad Maggie]].
document_data.name: Mickey
document_data.mainbody: '''Mickey''' was a [[fiendish flesh golem]] created by the [[night hag]] [[Mad Maggie]], and a member of her [[Knucklebones Gang]] in [[Avernus]].
document_data.Personality: The fiendish construct was described as being endearing but rather foolish.
document_data.Appearance:
Mickey was formed from various [[devil]], [[yugoloth]], and [[demon]] body parts. He was particularly large and was often dragged on a leash by Mad Maggie.<ref group="note">This description is based on the artwork on page 82 of ''[[Baldur's Gate: Descent into Avernus]]'' 

As of the {{YearlinkName|1494}}, Mickey had a piece of [[bone devil]] buried in his leg. Since he was unable to speak, he only grunted in pain when he walked or periodically hopped around in a little dance.
document_data.Relationships: Mickey was subservient to his creator Mad Maggie. He was often ridiculed by the [[redcap]]s and [[madcap]]s in the Knucklebones Gang.
